author: mhoyt
msg: Remove redundant AVT evaluation call.   ElemLiteralResults::evaluateAVTs is also invoked when the parent's method ElemUse::getFirstChildElemToExecute/ElemUse::getNextChildElemToExecute is called.

author: june
msg: Fixed packaging bug that affected VC7.1

author: mhoyt
msg: Fixed two issues:  No exception should be generated if <xsl:for-each> contains variables and no nodes are selected.    In addition, if an exception occurs elsewhere, assertion/abort should not occur when resetting the execution context

author: mhoyt
msg: Remove explicit -fno-elide-constructor option from Linux settings and add 'g++3' to list of compilers to test for option in configure
